name: mabel pot holder
sizes_available: 7.75" wide x 7.75" long, but instructions are provided to customize the size of your pot holder.
notes:
not only is this pot holder beautiful with its unique diamond design, but it's functional. the mabel pot holder is crocheted as a moss stitch square that is folded and seamed to create a double thick pot holder, that will protect your hands and counters as you cook. 

> the mabel pot holder is the fourth pattern in the 2023 pot holders galore crochet along. with the purchase of an ebook, you will receive all 12 (+1 bonus) pot holder patterns (one pattern every month during the crochet-along). in december, you’ll receive the final pot holder, along with the bonus pattern.

this pattern includes written instructions, step-by-step pictures, and a video tutorial to help you.

> the free pattern for the mabel pot holder can be found [**here!**][1]

> the complete video tutorial can be found [**here!**][2]

> you can learn more about the pot holders galore crochet along **[here!][3]**

skill level: easy / advanced beginner

language: english

crochet terminology: us terms

crochet stitches: chain, slip stitch, single crochet

size: this pot holder measures 7.75” wide x 7.75” long when laid flat. however, instructions are provided to customize the size of your pot holder.

> materials:

* 4.0mm crochet hook needed
* 155 yds / 142 m of any medium 4 worsted weight cotton yarn in 2 colours (1 main and 1 contrasting colour)
* scissors
* yarn needle
* stitch marker or safety pin

i hope you enjoy making your pot holders!
